module.name: physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation
module.keywords: module, connectivity, allocation, connectivity implementation, substrate, interconnect

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a link in the path between the functional definition and the geometric representation of the interconnect substrate conductive patterns that is an implementation of the connectivity in the functional definition.

inscope.li: physical node requirement to implementing component allocation;
items within the scope of Assembly_technology_arm;
items within the scope of Component_feature_arm;
items within the scope of Functional_assignment_to_part_arm;
items within the scope of Interface_component_arm;
items within the scope of Packaged_connector_model_arm;
items within the scope of Physical_connectivity_definition_arm;
items within the scope of Physical_unit_design_view_arm.

aa.refpath: physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation <= shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition {[product_definition => component_definition] [product_definition.description != 'laminate component']}

physical_node_requirement_to_implementing_component_allocation <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'implementation interface joint'} shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect => interface_mounted_join
